main event: A naval aviator observed a solid, slightly oblong object with a soft incandescent outline moving horizontally across his field of vision in Fairfax, Virginia.
interesting points: The sighting lasted only 3-5 seconds and was observed through a dining room window while having dinner., Local newspapers initially reported the object as a balloon., Another report from the same area noted 2-4 similar objects appearing in groups over a longer duration of 3.5 hours., The object was described as having a steady luminescent-white light and no apparent tail., The evaluation concluded that the observed object was likely a balloon.
sighted object: one solid oblong object with incandescent outline
witness description: a naval aviator who reported the sighting while having dinner
